keyMoments.title: Absalom's Invisible Attack
keyMoments.description: Absalom uses his Suke Suke no Mi powers to remain invisible while attacking the crew on the Thousand Sunny, manipulating objects and touching Robin inappropriately.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Absalom and demonstration of his Clear-Clear Fruit powers, establishing him as one of the Mysterious Four of Thriller Bark.

affiliations.role: Commander of Soldier Zombies and General Zombies

abilities.description: Can turn himself and anything he touches invisible using the Suke Suke no Mi powers.

reveals.information: Possesses the Suke Suke no Mi (Clear-Clear Fruit) allowing him to become invisible
Member of the Thriller Bark Pirates and one of the Mysterious Four

keyMoments.title: Hildon's Introduction
keyMoments.description: Hildon appears to Nami, Usopp, and Chopper after they flee from Cerberus. He politely introduces himself and offers to escort them to Dr. Hogback's mansion.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Hildon, establishing him as a seemingly friendly guide who will later betray the trio. Introduces the connection to Dr. Hogback.
keyMoments.quote: Please allow me to escort you to the mansion of the great Dr. Hogback!

abilities.description: Can fly using his bat-like wings and suspend himself upside down.

reveals.information: Is a Wild Zombie resembling a stitched-up vampire with bat wings
Serves as a messenger for Thriller Bark's Mysterious Four

keyMoments.title: Encounter with Cerberus
keyMoments.description: Nami, Usopp, and Chopper encounter the three-headed zombie dog Cerberus, which has one fox head instead of three dog heads. The creature chases the trio across the island.
keyMoments.significance: First zombie creature encountered on Thriller Bark, introducing the horror element and Dr. Hogback's bizarre zombie creations.

reveals.information: Is a zombie creature with three heads, one being a fox instead of a dog

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Chopper's Excitement About Dr. Hogback
keyMoments.description: Chopper reveals his deep admiration for Dr. Hogback, explaining that Hogback is a legendary genius surgeon whose miraculous operations earned him many awards before he mysteriously disappeared.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Chopper's emotional investment in meeting Hogback, setting up the painful betrayal when he discovers Hogback's unethical zombie experiments.
keyMoments.quote: Dr. Hogback is a genius! His operations were miraculous!

relationships.description: Chopper deeply admires Dr. Hogback as a legendary medical genius and pioneer in surgery.

evolutionMoments.description: Chopper expresses excitement and admiration upon learning that Dr. Hogback lives on Thriller Bark.

reveals.information: Knew about Dr. Hogback's legendary reputation in the medical community and admired him

keyMoments.title: Mini Merry II Debut
keyMoments.description: Franky reveals the Mini Merry II, a small paddle boat he created as a tribute to the Going Merry. He stored it in Soldier Dock Channel 2 of the Thousand Sunny.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Franky's understanding of the crew's emotional connection to their former ship and his thoughtfulness in creating a vessel to honor that memory.
keyMoments.quote: This is Channel 2 - the Mini Merry II! A present from me to you guys!

reveals.information: Created the Mini Merry II as a tribute to the Going Merry and stored it in Soldier Dock Channel 2

keyMoments.title: Brook Departs to Reclaim His Shadow
keyMoments.description: Brook demonstrates his ability to run across the ocean's surface using his lightweight skeleton body and departs from the Straw Hats to confront whoever stole his shadow on Thriller Bark.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Brook's unique skeletal abilities and his determination to reclaim his shadow so he can fulfill his promise to Laboon.
keyMoments.quote: I must go now. I have to reclaim my shadow!

keyMoments.title: Explains Thriller Bark's Origin
keyMoments.description: Brook reveals that Thriller Bark is not a natural island but an island ship that drifted from the West Blue and has been lurking in the Florian Triangle.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial world-building information about Thriller Bark's true nature and origin.
keyMoments.quote: This island... it drifted from West Blue.

abilities.description: Can run across the ocean's surface due to his lightweight skeleton body.

reveals.information: Can run across the ocean's surface due to being extremely lightweight as a skeleton
Knows that Thriller Bark originated from the West Blue and is the world's largest ship
